Edit: Thanks for all your answers, they provide a good resource for anyone looking to do something similar.
The decision, of course, is still to be made for the single case—there's no one "This is the right thing" sort of answer.
For my own case, I'll probably go with ctypes, but I'm also looking forward to trying out Cython in some other project.
With there being no single true answer, accepting one is somewhat arbitrary; I chose FogleBird's answer as it provides some good insight into ctypes and it currently also is the highest-voted answer.
